name: Rewinding The Clock
description:
Hello and welcome to my submission for the Brackeys Game Jam 2020.2.

In this game you play as a proffessor who invented time travel. You can save the current location in time by pressing "S" and traveling back to that saved place in time by pressing "T". 
There is a more detailed description in the game's tutorial level.

I hope you enjoy playing it. This was the second time making my own music and im still learning to.

PS:
For this game I was heavilly inspired by Rick and Morty's "The Vat of Acid Episode" where a device is made to do the exact same thing, save a place in time and go back to it once you've done what you wanted to do.
